titulo: Intermediate Spanish Short Stories: 10 Captivating Short Stories to Learn Spanish & Grow Your Vocabulary the Fun Way!
descripcion:
Improve your Spanish skills and grow your vocabulary with these 10 entertaining Spanish short stories! 
The best part of learning a new language is experiencing the culture and diving into activities that will enrich your life and vocabulary. You will find yourself unable to stop listening as you hear each captivating story that will engage your mind and help improve your Spanish. 
In this audiobook, you will find:
